Text: Grand! thanx 4 all of them Juan!

The subtitles are almost totally bullshit...
I don't know who made this, but people who doesn't understand french have no idea what 
the dialogues really mean...

The crappy subtitles ruined the film.  They make absolutely NO sense in English and are written by a non English speaking translator. 
That said, the movie was horrible anyway.  I can't belive rottentomatoes gave it such a good review.  Usually I agree with them, but not on this one.
Love the torrents and thank you for the wonderful selection you have posted.  I am not really into bitching after all of the films I have enjoyed from your collection, but the subs make this one not worth the download for English audiences.  Peace out, homme.
